comments: Considers recurrences u(n+1) = (d/dx) u_n(x)*u_{n-1}(x) and u(n+1) = x*(d/dx) u_n(x)*u_{n-1}(x). In latter, take u_0=1, u_1=x; setting x=1 gives sequence shown here.
references: H. W. Gould, Operational recurrences, Fib. Quart., 1 (No. 1, 1963), 30-33.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: Product F_k^F_{n+1-k}, k=1..n, F = Fibonacci numbers.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, May 16 2012
